Articles.Content: Are Dres-teroids visible? Or is the ring system not that dense?
They are asteroids in orbit of Dres. With a T3 tracking station, I haven't seen the roids, I believe you must send a vessel to it first.

Dresteroids are too small to be visible. You can track some and see their orbits though.

[![6Q07Sdg.png](http://i.imgur.com/6Q07Sdg.png)](http://imgur.com/6Q07Sdg)
